refnamediv.refpurpose: Fast Fourier Transform of a real-value array.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Applies a forward Fast Fourier Transform to a real-value input 1-dimensional array. The output is another array containing the transform, non-redundant, non-negative spectrum only. If the input array is power-of-two, the output array size will match the input size, with the first two points containing 0Hz and Nyquist frequency coefficients. Otherwise, the output will have two extra values (input size + 2), and the the Nyquist coefficient will be placed at kin[input_size] position (kin[1] and kin[input_size+1] will be 0].

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array containing the transform. It will be created if it does not exist.
kin[] -- input array containing the real-valued input.
